text: Rero Shetani ica ibafatira mukubahenda kwayo mugihe bahonja kuri cagiti, ibimaramare vyabo bica bira bonekena nuguca binjira kwimadikako ivyatsi vyo mw’ijuru, n’Umuremyi wabo aca arabahamagara nukuba bwira iti:- mbega sinababujije kuri iki giti nukubabwira yuko Shetani ari umwansi wanyu wo k’umugaragaro
